The area (km2) and type of conservation districts (Protective (P), Limited (L), Resource (R), General (G), and Special (SS)) within 1 km of the coastline for each West Hawaii Region. Data comes from DLNR-OCCL and is available on the Hawai’i State Office of Planning Hawai’i Statewide GIS Program Geospatial Data Portal (www.geoportal.hawaii.gov).
